metadata.title: CVE-2021-37601 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: muc.lib.lua in Prosody 0.11.0 through 0.11.9 allows remote attackers toobtain sensitive information (list of admins, members, owners, and bannedentities of a Multi-User chat room) in some common configurations.

criterions.comment: prosody package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
